author: StarManRSA
message:
"Everything I did wasn't actually me @Marcus Mmola this is not a court of law @Alvino Theunissen how is Zondo protecting Nhleko?
Dominic Przybylski,collective irresponsibility Sounds like he did no work at all. Gupta This man is acting guilty as sin. @Marcus Mmola It would be such a pleasure to see the judge walk over to witness and give him a snot clap whenever he wastes time or doesn't answer a question properly... afternoon fantasy. Does anyone know who was in the ""reference group""?" @Cerebis It's frustrating. I wonder how Nugent would have handled this commission. Perhaps Zondo should be wearing black leather with chains and a sjambok and give the witness a whipping every now and then. Why hide when nobody ever gets prosecuted? He seems to have avoided doing any work or taking any responsibility at all... Now that's not a crime but surely this kind of person should never be a cabinet minister. "2nd report indicates a revision of 1st report. Then obvious question is ""Why has the report been revised?""" So did you ask that question Mr Nhleko? It seems he plans to bore everybody to the point where they no longer ask him any more questions without the danger of dying of old age while in the same room. """All conditions for SAA rescue plan have now been met He didn't make anything of it because he was sleeping. "Once majority of people rely on corruption to survive a corrupt government becomes essential to them Nhleko is going to drag this out and Zondo is letting him do it. "A lot of the problems are due to a massive increase in population. Population was 12 million when I first went to school @Pienaar van Wyk Mbeki is responsible for 300 000 deaths due to his AIDS denialism. He believed it was anti-black propaganda Until our politicians accept responsibility as individuals we will be stuck with corruption and the poverty it propagates. @Craig Johnson Heh in this country the public are servants of public servants. @Cerebis I suspect that day will only come once we have all died from starvation. To identify people primarily by race can only be honestly done by people who identify themselves primarily by race. That is what a racist is. I feel sorry for them. @Zuptas have shipped their wealth to Dubai long ago. I travel by bicycle - carbon neutral. "@Kevin SANPARKS is asking for people to go cull hundreds of ostriches and thousands of warthogs because there are too many. Far too many humans Zondo is blindsiding his evidence leader. message: @Craven Morehead - hope the syncing is better here üôÇ ! This Nhleko is ducking & diving & Judge Zondo is being too accommodating. Deflect all the time!!! "@Sal Abdulla - yes you are right "@Bophelo Malapela - the Nats were a terrible racist regime & apartheid was a crime against humanity but the point of democracy was supposed to be the end of racism "The fact of the matter is that the ANC has ensured @Pienaar van Wyk - agreed "@Mpotseng Lebentlele - Cry The Beloved Country. If you can't see that then I'm not sure where you are living. I want us to uplift this country together @Mpotseng Lebentlele - don't show your ignorance & disrespect by playing that card! It doesn't work with me. "@Pienaar van Wyk - exactly right "@Pienaar van Wyk - you are wasting your knowledge on certain people here as they don't want to see facts "@MIKE DURBAN - yes @Mpotseng Lebentlele - if the cap fits .... @Mpotseng Lebentlele - ü§£ you are hysterical. "@Mpotseng Lebentlele - I know exactly what you said @Kevin - and alcohol "@Mpotseng Lebentlele - by the way who is ""we""?" @Mpotseng Lebentlele - let's be clear - I said apartheid was a racist regime & very wrong. "@Pienaar van Wyk - yip @Pienaar van Wyk - called the NDR - socialism & communism is the path we are on. author: Freddy Mhembere
message:
Africa guys
Bophelo Malapela,The nonsense on this platform questioning the integrity of DCJ Zondo because people do not understand legal processes is shocking This is a commission not a court @Gabisile Mahlangu how would you expect DCJ Zondo to behave next he will be accused of not being fit to be a judge as did Lucky Montana @kerry van Schalkwyk you have your own perceptions of how DCJ Zondo should conduct himself care to share @kerry van schalkwyk define assertive @kerry van schalkwyk from your meltdown I get the distinct impression you have no clue why nhleko is before the commission It‚Äôs nhlehos own problem is he refuses to answer questions as that might comeback to haunt him Nhleko is here responding to allegations made by McBride against him he does not have to give answers we like Let‚Äôs watch and learn. The fire pool has no relevance here McBride came to the commission and alleged that this issue of reports and werksmans attorneys was State capture Dramat and Sibiya lost their jobs because of this renditions nonsense. Sibiya last week won his case in labour court & wants his job back McBride was accused of doctoring the second report he also must answer "I am aware Unlawful operations of allowing Zimbabwe police to kidnap Zimbabweans & take them to Zimbabwe where they were killed @venecia Moore he had to sing for his supper "@monique‚Äôs makeup it does not matter their status in SA @pienaar van Wyk do tell Ok Washing of hands is a respectable way of asking to go to the toilet NP were serious criminals who committed crimes against humanity let‚Äôs not even start that discussion @cerebris ANC looting will never come close to the crime committed by NP and their supporters so let‚Äôs not have that debate We can lament the thuggery of the ANC without comparing to what we as blacks sufferedunder apartheid @cerebris death for blacks is not a new post democracy event You studied under Bantu education @pienaar van wyk. @mike Durban don‚Äôt be stupid @kerry van schalkwyk did you see me say otherwise Been to Soweto as part of the SADF @mpotseng lebentlele Soweto post democracy is not the same under apartheid he may just enjoy it @bruce Thackwell if that is true then EWC should not be a problem @pienaar van wyk how many squatter camps did you know in 92 Racists @mpotseng lebentlele can never hide no matter what they do or even if they have black friends "@pienaar van wyk apartheid and what it has done will never be wished away. The looting of the comrades will also never be wished away @mike Durban I am not your bra Lifestyle audits are amyth @mpotseng lebentlele there is a reason why racists always hide their identity Racist apologists need tranquilizer I will vote ANC everyday Soweto today is much better than the concentration camp it was under apartheid @kerry van schalkwyk then you proceeded to say many racist things "@kerry van schalkwyk I do not seem to be intelligent @mangalani mangalani you are lying @postmaster racists are not progress nor civilization they are the lowest form of trash @mangalani mangalani your evidence of this regression is a train ride. You need to get a car Prasa infrastructure has been stolen and we know the reasons for that @kevin until you or a loved one dies of this virus @craig Johnson when the victims of this crime say so until then deal with it @mangalani mangalani who is the we you talk of @mangalani mangalani EFF and other formations? Apartheid and colonialism lasted over 400 yrs. ANC has also messed up in the 26 yrs never treat apartheid as an event @cedric John Ramaphosa signed a proclamation that seeks to achieve that hopefully people will start going to jail @val spiers do not be stupid "@craig Johnson in the same way we will never forget and forgive apartheid Apartheid will never in repeat never be forgotten it‚Äôs inconvenient to its beneficiaries and apologists Singapore did not have apartheid @mike du Preez Bophelo is my name Bopis ke mmao We had colonialism and apartheid @kerry van schalkwyk The judge is required to have this type of temperament otherwise there will be issues of bias and fairness @gert pretorius that‚Äôs their choice We adjourn
